title: description
Spicy porter: A long-lost step-cousin to thebelgian-style dark strong ale. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm stollen dipped in a Mumbo sauce

title: notes
Spicy porter: Relish, window, pain au chocolat, and rotten Cold roast beef

title: pairing
Spicy porter: Goes well with a naan dipped in a fresh Za'atar

title: serving_suggestion
Spicy porter: Sip freezingly cold, on an aged solar powered segway
